title: Save Gmail attachments to Google Drive
description: Automatically save all attachments received in Gmail to a specified Google Drive folder.

title: Send Slack notifications for new Google Calendar events
description: Whenever a new Google Calendar event is created, post a notification in a Slack channel.

title: Add new Typeform responses to Google Sheets
description: Log every new Typeform submission into a Google Sheets spreadsheet for easy data analysis.

title: Create Trello cards from new Gmail emails
description: Convert important Gmail emails into Trello tasks automatically.

title: Post tweets automatically from RSS feeds
description: Whenever a new RSS feed item is published, automatically post it as a tweet on Twitter.

title: Send new Google Form responses to Discord
description: Get instant Discord notifications whenever a new response is submitted in Google Forms.

title: Create Asana tasks from Slack messages
description: Turn important Slack messages into actionable tasks in Asana with one automation.

title: Add Shopify orders to a Google Sheets report
description: Automatically log every Shopify order into Google Sheets for reporting and analytics.

title: Backup new Dropbox files to OneDrive
description: Automatically back up any new file in Dropbox into a OneDrive folder.

title: Send reminders in Slack for upcoming Google Calendar events
description: Stay on top of meetings by sending Slack reminders before events start.

title: Send a thank-you email via Gmail for new Google Form submissions
description: Automatically thank people with a Gmail email after they submit a Google Form.

title: Add new LinkedIn leads to HubSpot CRM
description: Whenever a new lead is captured on LinkedIn, automatically add them to HubSpot CRM.

title: Create Jira issues from GitHub commits
description: When a GitHub commit includes certain keywords, automatically create a Jira issue.

title: Send Google Sheet updates to Microsoft Teams
description: Whenever a row is added or updated in Google Sheets, post the update in Teams.

title: Send daily weather updates via Telegram
description: Get automatic daily weather reports delivered to a Telegram chat.

title: Add new Airtable records to Notion
description: Sync Airtable records to a Notion database for unified knowledge management.

title: Send a WhatsApp message for new Google Calendar events
description: Get a WhatsApp message whenever a new event is added to your Google Calendar.

title: Create GitLab issues from new Zendesk tickets
description: Turn incoming Zendesk support tickets into GitLab issues for developers.

title: Log new Twitter mentions in Google Sheets
description: Automatically add new Twitter mentions to a Google Sheet for monitoring engagement.

title: Add new Stripe payments to QuickBooks
description: Whenever a payment is processed in Stripe, log it in QuickBooks automatically.
